resources.string: The server cannot be contacted, it might be down temporarily or you may have lost your connection to the Internet.
I acknowledge that I have read and understood the Terms and Conditions.
The location service is not enabled.
The email or/and password is invalid.
Your account has been disabled, please contact {0} at {1} to activate your account.
Your account has not been activated. Another activation email was sent to you.
To book a ride, you need to enter a valid pickup address.
To book a ride, you need to enter a valid pickup address and destination address.
Please enter a valid pickup address.
Select to add a new location
The address you provided is invalid. Please verify this information
You are currently signed in as : {0}
Your are currently not signed in. You must be signed in to use this app.
Your account cannot be validated, you must log in to use this application
The data is invalid, friendly name and address fields are required.
The server cannot be contacted, try again later.
This action will cancel your order, do you want to continue ?
The order cannot be canceled, please call to cancel this order.
Booking a new taxi will keep this order active, do you want to continue ?
Enter your email and we\'ll send you a new one.
Enter your email and we\'ll send you a new one.
The pickup date and pickup time are invalid.
The password is invalid. The password and confirmation must be the same. The password must also be between 6 and 10 characters.
The mobile number is invalid. It must contain between 10 and 15 numbers.
The data is invalid, all the fields are required.
The server didn\'t specify why the account could not be created, if the error persist try creating the account from the web site.
Please note that the price provided by this App is an estimate only. The fare amount as calculated by the meter, along with any applicable minimums and extras will be charged at the end of the trip.
Please turn on location services to have your location show up in the map.
A new password was send by email.
Displaying trips from the last month
There are no email clients installed.
The pickup date must be in the future.
Cannot get status. Please call provider.
The data is invalid, all the fields are required.
An email has been sent. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your address.
Choose a destination to get a price estimate.
You need to specify a destination.
Reservation for {0:ddd, MMM d} at {0:h:mm tt}
You can no longer cancel this order.
The address associated to this contact cannot be validated.
Cannot find the address associated to this contact.
Cannot connect to Internet. Please check your connection settings and try again.
A new version of the application is available, please update the app to continue.
This email is already in use.
Error sending receipt for this order
Notes to driver (Name of business, specific entrance, ...)
You password has been updated, please sign in.
Start by selecting your current position.
Here\'s how to book a ride with just a couple of taps.
If it\'s a little off, simply reposition the map to your actual location.
We should be able to locate you using the GPS receiver in your mobile device.
You can search for a specific address or pick one from your favorites, contacts or a list of nearby places.
You may also select your pickup location by tapping the pickup address.
Doing so will provide an estimate for the cost for the trip.
If you want, you can also set your destination.
Or Tap the Later button to schedule your pickup for a future time or date.
Tap Book Now and a vehicle will be assigned as soon as possible.
Tap Confirm when you are ready to go.
The confirmation screen allows you to verify your trip details and to change any of your preferences for this specific ride.
Status updates are provided when the vehicles arrives at the pickup address, when you enter the vehicle, and at the end of the ride.
On the Status screen you will see a reservation number confirming your booking. Once a vehicle is assigned, you can watch as it progresses to your pickup location.
We hope you find this application both convenient and intuitive.
You can review your order history at any time, and even rebook a previous trip with the push of a button
Would you like a reminder added to your calendar for this pick-up time?
In order to use the application, you need to add a payment method to your account.
You need to have at least one credit card in your account. If you want to remove a card, you will need to add another one before.
You cannot delete your credit card when an order is scheduled or in progress.
Name as it appears on card
The Credit Card Number is invalid
Reminder: A taxi will pick you up from {0} at {1} on {2}.
Are you sure you want to remove this credit card ?
The phone number is invalid for this driver.
Thank you for riding with {0}, we look forward to serving you again soon.
Confirmation sent to the driver (Authorization Code: {0})
Error confirming with driver payment cancelled
Confirmation of payment has been sent to the driver.
Unable to retrieve vehicle number. Please pay in car.
Please confirm your car number with the driver

Please note that if the vehicle number presented above does not match the actual car number of your ride, we regret that payment cannot be processed through the Application. Please press the back button to return to the trip status screen, and pay the driver directly.
There was an error during pairing, verify your credit card information or try again later.
There was an error during unpairing, please try again later.
You need to update Google Play Services in order to use this application.
You need to rate your ride
Confirm that you are in the vehicle number indicated below. By Tapping “Confirm”, this ride will automatically be paid by your credit card on file.
Please enter a valid account number
Please enter a valid rider number
You must answer every questions marked as required to continue.

We noticed you do not have push notifications turned on. Just to let you know if you have them enabled then you get updates about the status of your booking without having to look at the app! We promise we will not spam you with useless information!
A text message with your code has been sent to your phone.
Delete the credit card registered to this account?
Your account is now enabled to pay with your card on file by default. You can still choose to pay in the vehicle by selecting \"Pay in Vehicle\" on the confirmation screen
Your account is now enabled to pay for rides with this credit card.
You cannot book this ride since an order is already pending. View the order status?
The nearest taxi is {0} and {1} {2} away
You chose to pay with a card on file, but you have no default card. Add a card to your account or change your payment method to continue.
Your credit card is expired. Add a new card to your account or update card informations to continue.
Your credit card has expired. Your account is now configured to pay in car. If you wish to continue using your card on file, you can click on Update.
We would appreciate your feedback on your last ride, would you like to rate it?
Your driver will call you back in a few minutes
Due to high demand, no vehicles are available right now. Do you want to book with {0} instead?
Account and rider numbers cannot be empty when Charge Type is set to Charge Account
The account or rider number that was entered doesn\'t exist
An error occured when updating the booking settings. Please make sure that the account number in your profile is valid and try again.
An error occured when updating the booking settings
You must have a card on file to use this account
You are leaving your local service area. Should you decide to book, your order will be dispatched using a taxi company from this area.
In order to use a promo code, you need to pay with your configured payment method.
In order to use a promo code, you need to have a payment method configured as part of your account.
In order to use a promo code, you need to have a PayPal account linked to your account.
In order to use a promo code, you need to enter a credit card as part of your account.
Please note that the discount will only be applied if the payment is made using the app.
Are you sure you don’t want to pay with your credit card on file?
If you decide to pay in car, you will not be able to use the promotion
You cannot book this ride since an order is already pending. View the order status?
Linking your PayPal account will remove your card on file and PayPal will be set as the default payment method. Proceed?
Adding a credit card will unlink your PayPal account and Card on File will be set as the default payment method. Proceed?
Unable to link your PayPal account
Unable to unlink your PayPal account
Your account is now enabled to pay with PayPal by default. You can still choose to pay in the vehicle by selecting \"Pay in Vehicle\" on the confirmation screen
The vehicle type that you selected does not have enough seats to accommodate your number of passengers. Please change your selection or book more than one car to accommodate your party size.
Your transaction was denied, please try again later or replace your credit card with a new one.
Your overdue payment of {0} has been settled and your account is now enabled to pay with your card on file by default.
Your credit card failed to pay the previous ride, you need to either retry to pay again or update your credit card information.
Your credit card failed to pay the previous ride. You will need to pay this outstanding amount for your card be reactivated.
Enter code {0} or press the button below
Tap to Enter or View Promo Code
The PayBack field must be all digits and must not exceed 10 characters in length
There is currently no entries for this filter.
Unable to load the history. Please try again later.
Unable to load the available promotions. Please try again later.
Unable to load the account settings. Please try again later.
Unable to load the payment details. Please try again later.
Enter the 7-digit code displayed on the taxi touchscreen to auto-pay and get an e-receipt at the end of your ride.
An error occurred during check in.
An error occured when trying to unpair. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to cancel? A vehicle is on its way to pick you up. {0} reserves the right to charge customers a cancellation fee if we feel the user is abusing the service.
When would you like to book?
You must select a charge type to be able to book a ride
You need to have a card on file to pair with RideLinQ
Please enter the CVV associated with your card on file ending with {0} to continue
The CVV must be a number between 3 and 4 digits
Your current card on file has an overdue payment for a previous ride. This overdue payment is preventing you from pairing with RideLinQ
Initialition of order of account payment
